ygData.subject: Re: What level will lanterns take me to?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found that if you sharpen 2handed weapons, you can go over 30.  If you have the time, this is a very good idea as those low lvl points cost allot to get
ygData.messageBody:
I have found that if you sharpen 2handed weapons, you can go over 30. If
you have the time, this is a very good idea as those low lvl points cost
allot to get up.

Grak the Troll
Master Smith
Master Potter
Master Brewer
Journeyman Baker
Apprentice Taylor
